messages.msgSnippet: Have you ever wondered why Muslim women wear veils? Do you think that they are forced by their husbands to cover up? Is it in their culture to wear long
messages.messageBody:
Have you ever wondered why Muslim women wear veils?

Do you think that they are forced by their husbands to cover up?

Is it in their culture to wear long clothes or is it part of their religion?

Has Islam given the women rights same as man?

What kind of religion is Islam and what do Muslims believe in?

Who is Allah and who is Prophet Mohammad?

What is the connection between the bible and thee quran and what do Muslims think of Jesus?

Do you think that the media gives the true picture of Islam in the west?

Aren't you suspicious or curious to know if what information you are receiving is true or false?

Why not be the judge and see for yourself ?!



http://islam-guide.com

http://www.todayislam.com/yusuf.htm

http://www.thetruereligion.org

http://www.sultan.org

http://www.al-sunnah.com

http://www.islam-qa.com

http://www.discoverislam.com

http://www.islamtoday.com

http://www.it-is-truth.org

http://www.prophetmuhammed.org

http://www.discoverislam.com
